text: the coolest part truth be told is that
they don't
limit access to the interns they treat
us like any other employee i get to work
on things that go straight to the
customer and i get to see the impact
that my projects have i get to sit in on
like customer calls and get to really
watch my team interact with their
clients and kind of help them put their
solutions together i would definitely
describe it as very like hands-on
helpful everyone's jumping in it's like
that's the one thing that stands out
it's always you're not doing it by
yourself you're really able to build
personal connections with people in
roles that aren't even your own it's
been really popular to talk about
diversity um but in terms of it actually
happening once you're you know a person
who's like there
it can be a whole different ball game so
i'm glad that i've been able to not only
network to see these like people
that look like me and
all that in these positions of power but
also just knowing that it's there um is
another very
empowering thing for me personally so
this is a once in a lifetime opportunity
and you're not gonna network or have any
other opportunities like this and you
should definitely apply it turned out to
be an amazing experience that i would
really cherish for my lifetime it's been
the best summer and i've met such
amazing people here you can go anywhere
